about_the_game:
Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat - Classic Dragon's Lair

Get the Hoard!
Whether the player characters are tracking down a dangerous red dragon or leading an assault on a great wyrm's cave, no Game Master wants to spend time drawing out the whole scene. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat Classics: Dragon's Lair, you don't need to. Thes maps illustrates two scenes where your heroes can fight for glory and treasure.
The most-popular Pathfinder Flip-Mats in history return! These fan-favorite maps feature versatile adventure settings--city streets, forests, ships, taverns, and more--and now they're back for a repeat performance. Lavishly detailed, these essential adventure set pieces are sure to bring excitement to your game table for years to come!
 NOTE: This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Wayne Arsenault
